text: Ba-Muaka Simakala (born 28 January 1997) is a German professional footballer of Congolese descent who plays as a forward for Roda JC Kerkrade in the Dutch Eerste Divisie. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:People from Eschweiler Category:German footballers Category:Germany youth international footballers Category:German people of Democratic Republic of the Congo descent Category:Association football forwards Category:Borussia Mönchengladbach players Category:Roda JC Kerkrade players Category:Bundesliga players Category:Regionalliga players Category:Eerste Divisie players Category:Footballers from North Rhine- Westphalia
title: Ba-Muaka Simakala
